titles.title: SAFER Act
SAFER Act
Strategic Acquisition and Floodplain Efficiency Reform Act
Strategic Acquisition and Floodplain Efficiency Reform Act
SAFER Act
A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a pilot program for public-private partnerships for disaster mitigation projects, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
